materials.raw_text:
- Calcium Oxide (CaO): 200 g 
 - Antimony Trioxide (Sb2O3): 180 g 
 - Selenium (Se): 120 g

 - Antimony Trioxide: Obtainable from specialty metal suppliers or online chemical retailers. 
 - Selenium: Can be sourced from chemical suppliers or online platforms specializing in elemental materials.

preparation.raw_text:
